author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-1911: Add a new DocIdSet.isCacheable() method that defaults to false, but is true for some DocIdSet impls, that are effective and use no disk I/O during iteration (OpenBitSet, SortedVIntList, DocIdBitSet, EMPTY_DOCIDSET, some FieldCache filter impls). CachingWrapperFilter now copies all DocIdSets, which are not cacheable, into an OpenBitSetDISI for caching.
